page.title: 12PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content:
STICKY TOFFEE
In your street or school playground you can play sticky toffee. There are about eleven people playing. One person says I went to the shop and I bought a sticky ...apple, until he says 'sticky toffee' then you all run. If the person catches you, you have to stand still with your hands out. They wait until someone goes under their arms when they are set free. If the person catches them all he has won. You have three chances. In games like this people usually say 'Fainites' if they're going to be caught or need some excuse. When they say 'Fainites',they cross their feet or fingers.
